HomePage.title: Save 47% Collection Costs, Reduce 35% Carbon Emissions with
HomePage.description: Designed for mayors, property managers, and facility operators. Revolutionary IoT-powered smart bins that dramatically reduce operational costs and environmental impact through intelligent monitoring and AI-driven insights.

features.title: Intelligent Features
features.description: Discover how our smart bin technology transforms waste management with cutting-edge IoT sensors, AI analytics, and real-time monitoring.

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Advanced sensors track fill levels, temperature, and usage patterns with 99.9% accuracy, enabling proactive waste management.
monitoring.alt: Real-time monitoring dashboard showing bin fill levels and sensor data

optimization.title: Route Optimization
optimization.description: AI-powered algorithms optimize collection routes, reducing fuel consumption by up to 40% and improving operational efficiency.
optimization.alt: Route optimization map interface showing optimized collection paths

categorization.title: Smart Sorting
categorization.description: Computer vision and machine learning automatically categorize waste types, improving recycling rates by 60%.
categorization.alt: Smart sorting system using computer vision to categorize waste types

tracking.title: Impact Tracking
tracking.description: Comprehensive analytics track environmental impact, carbon footprint reduction, and sustainability metrics in real-time.
tracking.alt: Environmental impact tracking dashboard with carbon footprint metrics

mobile.title: Mobile Integration
mobile.description: Intuitive mobile app provides real-time notifications, collection schedules, and gamified recycling rewards.
mobile.alt: Mobile app interface showing bin status notifications and recycling rewards

ai.title: AI Analytics
ai.description: Machine learning algorithms predict waste patterns, optimize collection schedules, and provide actionable insights.
ai.alt: AI analytics dashboard displaying predictive waste patterns and insights

comparison.alt: Smart Bin vs Traditional Bin comparison diagram showing intelligent monitoring and optimization benefits

traditional.title: Traditional Bins
traditional.alt: Traditional bin overflow status diagram showing red warning alert

smart.title: Smart Bin
smart.alt: Smart Bin with IoT sensors for real-time monitoring and optimization

comparison.result: Fewer collection trips, dramatically lower costs

scenarios.title: Smart Solutions
scenarios.description: Targeted technical solutions for real-world scenarios, with every problem backed by data-driven answers.

overflow.problem: Unpredictable overflow timing leads to waste spillage, environmental pollution, and increased complaints
overflow.solution: Ultrasonic sensors for real-time monitoring, 98% accuracy overflow alerts, proactive collection scheduling

odor.problem: High temperatures cause waste fermentation and odor spread, affecting surrounding environment and residents
odor.solution: Temperature + odor sensor integration, automatic sanitization system, 95% odor control rate

sorting.problem: Insufficient resident awareness leads to mixed recyclables, reducing recycling efficiency
sorting.solution: CV model recognition + voice prompts, 92% sorting accuracy, improved recycling quality

stats.title: Proven Impact
stats.description: Our smart bin technology has delivered measurable results across cities worldwide, creating a more sustainable future.
stats.efficiencyDesc: Average improvement in waste collection efficiency
stats.usersDesc: Citizens actively using our smart bin network
stats.wasteDesc: Total waste processed through our smart system
stats.citiesDesc: Smart cities using our waste management solution

collection.label: Collection Reduction
collection.description: Smart scheduling optimization significantly reduces unnecessary trips
collection.case: Case: Shenzhen Nanshan District - March 2024 data

reduction.label: Waste Reduction

reduction.case: Case: Shanghai Pudong New Area - February 2024 data

recycling.label: Recycling Rate Boost
recycling.description: AI recognition and user education dramatically improve sorting quality
recycling.case: Case: Beijing Chaoyang District - January 2024 data

tech.description: Built with cutting-edge technologies to ensure reliability, scalability, and seamless integration with existing city infrastructure.

iot.description: Advanced sensors and microcontrollers for real-time data collection and wireless communication.

cloud.description: Scalable cloud platform for data processing, storage, and real-time analytics with 99.9% uptime.

mobile.title: Mobile Applications
mobile.description: Cross-platform mobile apps for citizens, collectors, and administrators with offline capabilities.

data.description: High-performance databases and streaming platforms for real-time data processing and analytics.

ai.description: Advanced ML models for predictive analytics, computer vision, and intelligent decision making.
